cooking_method: Marinate pork in achiote paste, then roast on a spit. Serve in corn tortillas with diced pineapple and onion.
Roast and peel poblano peppers, then stuff with ground beef and tomato sauce. Bake until bubbly and golden.
Blend tomatillos, jalapenos, and cilantro into a sauce. Dip tortillas in sauce, fill with shredded chicken, and roll up. Top with more sauce and bake.
Heat tortillas, sprinkle with cheese and green onions, fold in half, and cook until cheese is melted. Serve with sour cream and salsa.
Dice tomatoes, onion, and jalapenos. Mix with lime juice and cilantro. Serve with tortilla chips.
Soak corn husks, then spread masa dough on each one. Add filling of pork and chili powder, wrap, and steam until cooked.
Mash avocados, then mix in diced onion, tomato, and cilantro. Add lime juice and salt to taste. Serve with tortilla chips.
Mix masa dough and shape into small cups. Fryuntil golden and crisp. Fill with beans, cheese, lettuce, and sour cream.
Simmer hominy, pork, chili powder, garlic, and oregano in a broth until the meat is tender. Serve with lime wedges and toppings like radishes, avocado, and shredded cabbage.
Fry or bake tortillas until crispy. Top with refried beans, shredded chicken, lettuce, and salsa.
Fill tortillas with cooked ground beef, black beans, and cheese. Fold and fry until crispy. Serve with sour cream.
Fry tortillas, then top with eggs cooked to your preference, salsa, black beans, and sliced avocado.
Marinate cooked shrimp in lime juice until they turn pink. Mix with diced tomato, onion, and cilantro. Serve chilled.
Marinate steak in lime juice, garlic, and cilantro. Grill or broil until charred and cooked to your liking. Serve with tortillas.
Roast tomatoes, jalapenos, garlic, and onion until charred. Blend with cilantro and salt to taste.
Slice bread, spread with refried beans, and top with grilled steak, sliced avocado, and sour cream.
Simmer tortilla chips in tomato sauce until softened. Top with shredded chicken, crumbled queso fresco, and sour cream.
Dice tomatoes, onion, and jalapeno peppers. Mix with lime juice and cilantro.
